msg: removed final from isVisible to support more elegant use of cases that had to be done like:

author: jonl
msg: Moved invalid input state logic up into FormComponent and changed form validation
logic so that updates to the model only occur when validation of the whole form
is successful.  This works for textfields now, but we may need to tweak other
components so they track invalid state during failed validations.

author: jonl
msg: Factored out AbstractDetachableModel so that attach/detach logic is encapsulated here and DetachableModel extends it for models with a transient Object property and PropertyModel extends it for models with an OGNL nature which might have nested detachable models.

author: jonl
msg: Narrowed return from MRUMap to Map.  Changed PageLink to use Session's page factory instead of newInstance() (nice catch eelco!).
